meanings.definition: A unit of electrical resistance equal to one million ohms.
meanings.sent1: The multimeter showed a reading of one megohm for the electrical circuit.
meanings.sent2: The technician measured the resistance of the wire in megohms.
meanings.sent3: Why did the ohm go to school? To become a megohm!
meanings.sent4: The old light bulb flickered, struggling against the megohms of resistance.
meanings.sent5: The concept of megohms can be challenging for beginners to grasp.

meanings.definition: The SI unit of electrical resistance, equal to one million ohms.
meanings.sent1: The megohms value indicated a high level of resistance in the circuit.
meanings.sent2: Engineers often use megohms to measure the resistance in electronic components.
meanings.sent3: The megohms in the wire seemed to be playing hide and seek with the current.
meanings.sent4: The speaker's voice echoed through the room, facing the megohms of the microphone.
meanings.sent5: The megohms reading on the device was crucial for troubleshooting the issue.
